result.title: Define MVP Features
result.description: Identify key features that will enable users to track their carbon footprint, including data input, reporting, and visualization.

result.title: Build Data Input System
result.description: Develop a system for users to input carbon footprint data, such as energy use, transportation, and waste production. This system should be user-friendly and intuitive.

result.title: Develop Reporting System
result.description: Create a reporting system that allows users to see their carbon footprint data in an easy-to-understand format. This may include charts, graphs, and other visual aids.

result.title: Create User Accounts & Authentication
result.description: Set up user accounts and authentication to ensure data security and privacy. This will also allow users to save their carbon footprint data and access it at any time.

result.title: Test MVP
result.description: Thoroughly test the MVP to ensure that it is functioning as expected, and address any bugs or issues that arise.

result.title: Launch MVP
result.description: Launch the MVP for beta testing with a small group of users. Gather feedback and make necessary improvements before launching to a wider audience.

result.title: Launch to Market
result.description: Launch the final product to the market, targeting environmentally conscious individuals who are interested in tracking and reducing their carbon footprint. Continuously improve and add features based on user feedback.
